javadoc:
Interface to define event types and the method to generate an
 event within Program.

methods.name: setChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state of a Data Type Archive as having changed and generate
 the event of the specified type.  Any or all parameters may be null.

params.name: oldValue
params.comment:
original value or an Object that is related to
 the event

params.name: newValue
params.comment:
new value or an Object that is related to the
 the event

methods.name: setObjChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state of a Data Type Archive as having changed and generate
 the event of the specified type.  Any or all parameters may be null.

params.name: affectedObj
params.comment: object that is the subject of the event

params.name: oldValue
params.comment:
original value or an Object that is related to
 the event

params.name: newValue
params.comment:
new value or an Object that is related to the
 the event

name: DataTypeArchiveChangeManager
comment:
Interface to define event types and the method to generate an
 event within Program.

fields.javadoc: Data type was added to a category.
fields.name: DOCR_DATA_TYPE_ADDED
fields.comment: Data type was added to a category.

fields.javadoc: Data type was removed from a category.
fields.name: DOCR_DATA_TYPE_REMOVED
fields.comment: Data type was removed from a category.

fields.javadoc: Data type was moved to another category.
fields.name: DOCR_DATA_TYPE_MOVED
fields.comment: Data type was moved to another category.

fields.javadoc: The settings on a data type were updated.
fields.name: DOCR_DATA_TYPE_SETTING_CHANGED
fields.comment: The settings on a data type were updated.

fields.javadoc: Data type was replaced in a category.
fields.name: DOCR_DATA_TYPE_REPLACED
fields.comment: Data type was replaced in a category.

fields.javadoc: A custom format for a data type was added.
fields.name: DOCR_CUSTOM_FORMAT_ADDED
fields.comment: A custom format for a data type was added.

fields.javadoc: A custom format for a data type was removed.
fields.name: DOCR_CUSTOM_FORMAT_REMOVED
fields.comment: A custom format for a data type was removed.
